item.title: Video Animator/Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and creative Video Animator to transform 20-second to 1-minute videos into captivating animated content. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in animation, a keen eye for detail, and the ability to bring stories to life through motion graphics.

Key Responsibilities:
Collaborate with the creative team to understand project requirements and objectives.
Create high-quality animations that align with the company's brand and vision.
Transform short video clips into engaging animated content.
Use various animation techniques to enhance visual storytelling.
Ensure all animations are delivered on time and meet the required specifications.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and tools to continuously improve animation quality.

Qualifications:
Proven experience as a Video Animator or in a similar role.
Proficient in animation software such as Adobe After Effects, Toon Boom, Blender, or similar tools.
Strong portfolio showcasing previous animation work.
Excellent understanding of animation principles, storytelling, and visual composition.
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
Strong communication skills and attention to detail.
Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.

Preferred Skills:
Experience with 2D and 3D animation.
Knowledge of sound design and video editing.
Familiarity with graphic design software such as Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator.
Understanding of video production processes and workflows.

Please note, I am not looking for complete perfection. The person is there for structure but the animated character can look differently. I have attached a test video as an example of what needs to be animated. Please use this video if you would like to showcase your work.

Budget: $450
Posted On: June 22, 2024 12:20 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Character Design, Concept Artistry, 2D Art, Digital Art
Skills: Character Design, Concept Artistry, 2D Art, Digital Art
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Content Creator for X, Youtube, Ticktock, and Linkedin - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced content creator to join our team and help us develop engaging and compelling content for our brand on various platforms including X, YouTube, Ticktock, and Linkedin. As a content creator, you will be responsible for creating and editing videos, writing blog posts, designing graphics, and managing social media accounts. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of each platform's algorithm and best practices, as well as experience in content strategy and creation.

  Skills:
- Ability to create engaging content with great hooks and body
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g. Adobe Premiere Pro)
  - Excellent writing and editing skills
  - Graphic design skills (e.g. Adobe Photoshop)
  - Knowledge of social media management tools (e.g. Hootsuite)
  - Familiarity with SEO best practices

  This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 3 to 6 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level content creator who can work independently and deliver high-quality content within deadlines.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 12:19 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Content Writing, Social Media Marketing, Graphic Design, Social Media Management
Skills: Content Writing, Social Media Marketing, Graphic Design, Social Media Management
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Car Plate Number Extraction from Surveillance Video - Upwork
item.description:
I am in need of a skilled individual who can help me extract the car plate number from a surveillance video. A person crashed into my car and ran away, but luckily I have video footage from the incident. The task at hand is to analyze the video footage and extract the car plate number of the perpetrator's vehicle.

item.title: Hair Cleaning Process Video by Someone with Psoriasis - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an individual with psoriasis who is willing to film their hair cleaning process for a video project. The video will aim to provide insight and tips for others with psoriasis who may face challenges when washing their hair. The footage should clearly show the steps you take, the products used, and any specific techniques you employ to manage your condition. This video will be used to raise awareness and provide helpful information to those in the psoriasis community.
  Skills needed:
  - Psoriasis
  - Excellent communication and presentation skills
  - Knowledge of haircare products and techniques for psoriasis management
  - Ability to film and edit high-quality videos
  - Attention to detail

Budget: $10

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Graphic Design, Video Production, Explainer Video, 2D Animation

item.title: TikTok Video Edits - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editor & Voiceover Specialist for Shilajit Brand TikTok Videos

Description:

Hello!

I am looking for a talented and creative video editor and voiceover specialist to help produce high-quality TikTok videos for my Shilajit brand. If you are familiar with creating engaging content like @nurojit on TikTok, this job is perfect for you!

Project Overview:

I will film the raw footage for the videos, and I need someone who can:

Perform voiceovers or use AI voiceover tools
Edit the footage to create polished and engaging videos
Add text overlays, animations, and effects
Optimize videos for TikTok (9:16 aspect ratio)
Ensure a consistent and professional style across all videos
Responsibilities:

Voiceover:
Record professional voiceovers or utilize AI voiceover tools to match the video’s tone and style.
Video Editing:
Edit the provided footage to create dynamic and engaging videos.
Add text overlays, animations, and effects to enhance visual appeal.
Sync voiceover with video clips for a seamless experience.
Optimization:
Ensure videos are optimized for TikTok format (9:16 aspect ratio).
Add appropriate background music and sound effects.
Consistency:
Maintain a consistent brand voice and style across all videos.
Incorporate feedback and make revisions as needed.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing and voiceover work.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Experience with voiceover recording or AI voiceover tools.
Strong understanding of TikTok trends and video optimization.
Creative mindset and attention to detail.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience creating content for health and wellness brands.
Familiarity with Shilajit and its benefits.
Strong portfolio showcasing previous TikTok or social media video work.
Application Process:

If you are interested in this opportunity, please submit the following:

A brief introduction about yourself and your experience.
Links to your portfolio or examples of previous work.
Your proposed rate for this project.
Any relevant experience with health and wellness brands.
I look forward to collaborating with a talented professional who can help bring my Shilajit brand to life on TikTok!

Thank you!



Hourly Range: $6.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 12:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Music Video, Education, Video Intro & Outro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Music Video, Education, Video Intro & Outro
Country: Denmark
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Thumbnail Artist In The Bodycam Niche - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there!
We're looking for a creative YouTube Thumbnail Artist to join our team. If you have experience designing eye-catching thumbnails, especially in the bodycam niche, this could be the perfect gig for you!

What We're Looking For:
- Experience: You should know how to create thumbnails that grab attention and make viewers want to click. Familiarity with the bodycam niche is a plus.
- Availability: We have three channels, so there's plenty of work to go around. If you're good, we can offer you lots of projects.
- Skills: Quick turnaround times are essential. We also value eagerness to learn, as we will help you get the hang of our specific style.

In order for you to properly understand the style of thumbnail that we are looking for, we've attached some channels that use the style that we are interested in:
https://www.youtube.com/@DrInsanityCrime/videos
https://www.youtube.com/@X-Cop
https://www.youtube.com/@DetectiveWilliams/videos
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6wvxxHKW8KEnStASykvUbw


What We Offer:
- Flexible Hours: Work when it suits you. We're flexible as long as you meet deadlines.
- Negotiable Pay: Your rate will depend on the quality and consistency of your work. We're willing to negotiate to find a rate that works for both of us.

How to Apply:
- Show us some of your previous work with YouTube thumbnails.
- Tell us a bit about your experience with designing and why you think you'd be a great fit.
- We have this document created to help you make a sample to attach in your application. Please note that samples following the guidelines of number 3, 4 and 5 are preferred: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1MzP2dt8xLth4xZhHfOP0XuQE-jUDNR69dDRkFbdX95A/edit#heading=h.fn1lcuro7w5h

If you're passionate about creating awesome visuals and want to be part of a growing team, we'd love to hear from you!

Feel free to reach out if you have any questions. We're excited to see what you can do! Please remember, people who submit a sample according to the document above will be our priority

Note: Make sure your application is simple, straightforward, and showcases your best work. We welcome artists from all backgrounds and look forward to seeing your creativity in action!

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 22, 2024 11:59 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Thumbnail, Graphic Design, YouTube Thumbnail
Skills: Thumbnail, Graphic Design, YouTube Thumbnail
Country: Cyprus
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Youtube Presenter Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking experienced Youtube presenters to join our team. As a presenter, your primary responsibility will be to host and produce high-quality videos for our YouTube channel. You must have a strong on-camera presence and the ability to engage our audience effectively. The ideal candidate should have excellent communication skills in any language, be knowledgeable about various topics, and be comfortable speaking in front of the camera and conducting interviews. This role requires creativity, strong attention to detail, and the ability to work independently. If you are passionate about creating engaging video content and have previous experience as a YouTube presenter, we would love to hear from you. It can be a one-time, part-time, or full-time presenter. Many positions available.

Skills required:
- Excellent communication skills
- Strong on-camera presence
- Ability to engage and connect with the audience
- Knowledgeable about various topics
- Comfortable speaking in front of the camera

Hourly Range: $20.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 11:52 UTC
Category: Presentation Design
Skills:YouTube Marketing, English, Video Editing, US English Dialect, Social Media Marketing
Skills: YouTube Marketing, English, Video Editing, US English Dialect, Social Media Marketing
Country: United States

item.title: Psoriasis Scalp Cleaning and Filming - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking individuals with psoriasis who are willing to clean their scalp and document the process on video. This is an ongoing weekly project that aims to educate and raise awareness about scalp care for people with psoriasis. The selected candidate will be expected to follow a specific scalp cleaning routine provided by us, film the process, and submit the videos on a regular basis. As this project involves a sensitive topic, we require candidates who are comfortable sharing their journey with psoriasis. The ideal candidate should have good communication skills and be able to follow instructions accurately.

Relevant skills:
- Psoriasis management
- Scalp care
- Videography
- Communication

Size: Small
Duration: More than 6 months
Expertise: Entry

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 22, 2024 11:50 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Content Video Editor for Company Branding - Upwork
item.description:
Please only apply if you are in PHILIPPINES.

We are seeking a skilled and creative Video Editor to join our team and take charge of editing compelling content for our company's YouTube and Facebook channels. As a Video Editor, you will be responsible for crafting engaging videos that effectively communicate our brand message and engage our target audience.

Responsibilities:

1. Edit raw footage into polished videos for YouTube and Facebook, adhering to brand guidelines and maintaining a consistent style.
2. Collaborate with the marketing team to develop concepts and storyboards for video content.
3. Incorporate graphics, animations, and special effects to enhance the visual appeal of videos.
4. Ensure videos are optimized for different platforms and formats, considering factors such as aspect ratio and video length.
5. Stay updated on industry trends and best practices to continually improve the quality and effectiveness of our video content.
6. Coordinate with other team members, including videographers and content creators, to ensure smooth production workflows.




Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00

item.title: Audio cleaning - 2 x 1-min videos - Upwork
item.description:
Have 2 MP4 videos recorded with a mobile phone that need a small amount of audio editing.

Both were recorded outside and there is some background noise at some point e.g. traffic, people talking as they walk past or an airplane.  

We'd like the audio cleaned up and the file returned to us so it can be used on social media.   We anticipate it will take less than one hour to do both.


Posted On: June 22, 2024 11:24 UTC

item.ns0:encoded:
Have 2 MP4 videos recorded with a mobile phone that need a small amount of audio editing.

Both were recorded outside and there is some background noise at some point e.g. traffic, people talking as they walk past or an airplane.  

We'd like the audio cleaned up and the file returned to us so it can be used on social media.   We anticipate it will take less than one hour to do both.


Posted On: June 22, 2024 11:24 UTC
Category: Audio Editing

item.title: Video Animator needed to create 2D/3D video explaining a concept - Upwork
item.description:
Description:

Honour International University (HIU) is seeking a talented and experienced video animator to create an engaging and inspirational video that showcases the journey of a student through our HIU Pathway Program. The video will highlight key stages from enrollment at HIU to starting a new life abroad, capturing the transformative experience our program offers.

Project Scope:

We need a professional who can bring our vision to life with high-quality visuals, smooth transitions, and compelling storytelling. The video will be approximately 95 seconds long and will follow a provided storyboard that details the journey of a student from enrollment to graduation and beyond.

Requirements:

Proven experience in video animation and editing, particularly in creating promotional or educational content.
Strong portfolio showcasing previous work with similar themes and styles.
Ability to create high-quality visuals and smooth transitions.
Excellent storytelling skills to convey the student’s journey effectively.
Creativity and attention to detail to bring our vision to life.
Good communication skills to collaborate with our team and incorporate feedback.
Deliverables:

A 60 - 90 second animated video based on the provided storyboard.
Source files and final rendered video in high definition.
Revisions based on feedback until the final video meets our expectations.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 11:22 UTC
Category: 3D Animation
Skills:Motion Graphics, 3D Animation, Character Design, Video Production, Animation, Illustration
Skills: Motion Graphics, 3D Animation, Character Design, Video Production, Animation, Illustration
Country: India
click to apply
